vulnerabilities.title: Improper Control of Dynamically-Managed Code Resources in config-shield
vulnerabilities.description: scripts/cli.js in the GoDaddy node-config-shield (aka Config Shield) package before 0.2.2 for Node.js calls eval when processing a set command. **NOTE:** the vendor reportedly states that this is not a vulnerability. The set command was not intended for use with untrusted data.
